dimensions_positive.name: dimensions_positive
dimensions_positive.value: (width IS NULL OR width > 0) AND (height IS NULL OR height > 0)

latitude_range.name: latitude_range
latitude_range.value: latitude IS NULL OR (latitude >= -90 AND latitude <= 90)

longitude_range.name: longitude_range
longitude_range.value: longitude IS NULL OR (longitude >= -180 AND longitude <= 180)

accepted_before_expiry.name: accepted_before_expiry
accepted_before_expiry.value: accepted_at IS NULL OR accepted_at <= expires_at

latitude_range.name: latitude_range
latitude_range.value: latitude IS NULL OR (latitude >= -90 AND latitude <= 90)

longitude_range.name: longitude_range
longitude_range.value: longitude IS NULL OR (longitude >= -180 AND longitude <= 180)

altitude_range.name: altitude_range
altitude_range.value: altitude IS NULL OR (altitude >= -500 AND altitude <= 9000)

health_score_range.name: health_score_range
health_score_range.value: health_score IS NULL OR (health_score >= 0 AND health_score <= 100)

vitality_score_range.name: vitality_score_range
vitality_score_range.value: vitality_score IS NULL OR (vitality_score >= 0 AND vitality_score <= 100)
